Where r the subtitles!! i've downloaded the movie but no subs! pls respond.. otherwise just wasting more time and GB's for nothing. thx

The .srt file is the subtitle. Place the movie and the srt file in the same folder and play.
If you convert it to dvd, add the subtitle to the avi file.
More information, look at google.
Everybody knows how to use an .srt file.
